verses.name: Jeremiah 48:1
verses.text: Against Moab thus saith the Lord of hosts, the God of Israel; Woe unto Nebo! for it is spoiled: Kiriathaim is confounded and taken: Misgab is confounded and dismayed.

verses.name: Jeremiah 48:2
verses.text: There shall be no more praise of Moab: in Heshbon they have devised evil against it; come, and let us cut it off from being a nation. Also thou shalt be cut down, O Madmen; the sword shall pursue thee.

verses.name: Jeremiah 48:3
verses.text: A voice of crying shall be from Horonaim, spoiling and great destruction.

verses.name: Jeremiah 48:4
verses.text: Moab is destroyed; her little ones have caused a cry to be heard.
